name: Enabled User Right in AD to Control User Objects
description: Detects scenario where if a user is assigned the SeEnableDelegationPrivilege right in Active Directory it would allow control of other AD user objects.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4704 AND winlog.event_data.PrivilegeList:*SeEnableDelegationPrivilege*)`
